docs.snippet: It took the New York Cosmos and their general manager, Clive Toye, an unsuccessful season to find out that players must be more than skillful and imaginative to play in the North American Soccer League.
docs.lead_paragraph: It took the New York Cosmos and their general manager, Clive Toye, an unsuccessful season to find out that players must be more than skillful and imaginative to play in the North American Soccer League.

headline.main: Cosmos: Experiment That Failed; Cosmos Woes: Players Are Out of Their League

docs.snippet: NORTH CONWAY, N.H., Aug. 10 In barely 50 sunsoaked minutes on the clay courts of this mountain resort today, Jimmy Connors reaffirmed his mastery over Ken Rosewall in winning the $100,000 Volvo international tennis tournament. The scores were 6-2,...
docs.lead_paragraph: NORTH CONWAY, N.H., Aug. 10 In barely 50 sunsoaked minutes on the clay courts of this mountain resort today, Jimmy Connors reaffirmed his mastery over Ken Rosewall in winning the $100,000 Volvo international tennis tournament. The scores were 6-2, 6-2.
docs.abstract: Jimmy Connors defeats Ken Rosewall in $100,000 Volvo internatl tennis tourn at North Conway, NH on Aug 10 (S)

headline.main: Connors Downs Rosewall Again, 6-2, 6-2; Connors Beats Rosewall Again, 6-2, 6-2

byline.original: By PRANAY GUPTE Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: LONDON Illich Remirez Sanchez, the bespectacled Venezuelan assassin sought by police in four European countries for shooting to death two detectives and an informer in a Paris flat, was given weapons training in Lebanon by the Marxist Popular Front...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON Illich Remirez Sanchez, the bespectacled Venezuelan assassin sought by police in four European countries for shooting to death two detectives and an informer in a Paris flat, was given weapons training in Lebanon by the Marxist Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine. That is what the Popular Font asserts and there is little reason to doubt it; the dead informer was one of their men who had changed sides.
docs.abstract: Robert Fisk article on extent of internatl cooperation among terrorist groups and on instances of non-cooperation; drawing

headline.main: They Exchange Arms and Talk, but They're Not Quite a Brotherhood; The World's Terrorists Sometimes Are United

docs.snippet: SOUTH ORANGE, N.J., Aug. 18 Jimmy Connors of Belleville, Ill., was hard pressed to score a 7-5, 7-6 victory over Jeff Borowiak of Berkeley, Calif., before a near-capacity crowd of 3,100 in a first-round match of the $50,000 Tennis Week open tonight...
docs.lead_paragraph: SOUTH ORANGE, N.J., Aug. 18 Jimmy Connors of Belleville, Ill., was hard pressed to score a 7-5, 7-6 victory over Jeff Borowiak of Berkeley, Calif., before a near-capacity crowd of 3,100 in a first-round match of the $50,000 Tennis Week open tonight at the Orange Lawn Tennis Club.

headline.main: Connors Advances In Jersey; Connors Gains in New Jersey

docs.snippet: The interminable, boring matches that the Women's Tennis Association had feared would hurt its image have failed to materialize so far at Forest Hills. Spectators who flocked to the United States Open in record-break ing numbers yesterday ex pressed...
docs.lead_paragraph: The interminable, boring matches that the Women's Tennis Association had feared would hurt its image have failed to materialize so far at Forest Hills. Spectators who flocked to the United States Open in record-break ing numbers yesterday ex pressed delight with the wo men's matches as well as the men's on the slower courts.

headline.main: Fans Enjoy Women's Tennis at Open; Forest Hill Spectators Enjoy Women's Tennis

docs.snippet: The Rosebud never blos somed yesterday, but Jimmy Connors and Bjorn Bora were in full bloom during the United States Open Tennis championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rosebud never blos somed yesterday, but Jimmy Connors and Bjorn Bora were in full bloom during the United States Open Tennis championships.

headline.main: Connors and Nastase Triumph, Miss Casals Upset in U.S. Tennis; Connors Gains in U.S. Tennis

docs.snippet: Juliet Bleecker Carter and Piers H. de la Force were married in Rye, N.Y., yesterday afternoon. The Rev. Dr. Wendell Phillips, rector of Christ's Episcopal Church in Rye, performed the ceremony on the lawn at the Manursing Island home of Mr. and Mrs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Juliet Bleecker Carter and Piers H. de la Force were married in Rye, N.Y., yesterday afternoon. The Rev. Dr. Wendell Phillips, rector of Christ's Episcopal Church in Rye, performed the ceremony on the lawn at the Manursing Island home of Mr. and Mrs. Eric Walker Peniston.

headline.main: Juliet Bleecker Carter Married To Piers H. de la Force in Rye

docs.snippet: FLORENCE, Italy, Sept. 7 With the help of tortillas, pizza, posters and pop, the Italian  Communist party is attracting thousands to a national festival here in hopes of further enhancing its acceptability.
docs.lead_paragraph: FLORENCE, Italy, Sept. 7 With the help of tortillas, pizza, posters and pop, the Italian Communist party is attracting thousands to a national festival here in hopes of further enhancing its acceptability.
docs.abstract: Ital Communist party is holding 2-wk natl festival in Florence in hopes of further enhancing its acceptability; newspaper L'Unita says festival is place to gather in soc that is splitting up; party's ability to remain relatively unharmed from potentially damaging issues in Portugal discussed; Portuguese Communists, angered by stand of their Ital colleagues, are among few Communist parties not represented at festival; Ital Communist party's recent pol gains noted (M)

headline.main: COMMUNIST FAIR A BIG HIT IN ITALY; Party Stages Festivities to Demonstrate Efficiency and Enhance Image

byline.original: By ALVIN SHUSTER Special to The New York Times
